title: Donald Tusk warns Brexit extension could be the last as he says goodbye to his 'British friends'
text:
Donald Tusk warned on Tuesday night that the three month Brexit extension to Jan 31 2020 could be the last.

The EU27 formally adopted the “flextension” in writing, avoiding the need for an emergency Brexit summit.

“Please make the best use of this time,” the president of the European Council tweeted. “The EU27 has formally adopted the extension.It may be the last one.”

The extension will last until Jan 31 but Brexit could happen earlier, at 11pm UK time on Nov 30 or December 31. The deal must be ratified by first the House of Commons and then the European Parliament before Brexit can happen.

Mr Tusk, who steps down on November 30 to be replaced by Charles Michel, the former Belgian prime minister, has...
description: Donald Tusk warned on Tuesday night that the three month Brexit extension to Jan 31 2020 could be the last.
